column2: I'm obsessed. I got the steak and eggs with potatoes and orange juice. The steak was medium rare just like I asked for
column3: the eggs were perfectly cooked to my liking
column4: and the potatoes have had me dreaming about going back since I first found this place. After my first time being here I literally went back the following day lol. It's so tasty
column5: the waiters are all so friendly
column6: and it's creatively decorated both inside and outside! Oh and the orange juice is a MUST try. It was so delicious!!!!
